data.text: Guye loo ɠundiɠii nɔnɔi ʋe. Davide ná-guyei. Guyei.
GALA ge wuzeɠe, sili nuiti ti vaza,
Ʋelei abu luului a ɗa ɲɛɛlɛ la, ɗa ti ɲɛɛlɛ ɠana,
Naazu telebo nuiti ta ɠoozunɛ,
À guyei loo GALA bɛ! À maamusɛ ga wa-wuye wooiti!
Tɔ ɠa é ga podointi ti-ɠɛɛ, poanzaiti maalobo nui,
GALA ka ɗa pɛlɛyeɠei ve gilɛ nuiti bɛ,
GALA, siɛgi zu è ɠɛni losu da ɗa-nuɓusɛiti untuɠɔ,
zooi ɓalini, geeɠɔlɔgi ɠaawuunni, é ɠɛ ga ziɛi, GALA gaazu,
Ee, GALA, è ɗa-vaanɛɛ lonai ʋuuni.
Ɗa-nuɓusɛiti ta zeini ná, ʋɛ è ti zeini ná ɗa-nuɓɔɠɔlai ʋɔ,
Maliɠii woo ɠila boni,
kɔɔʋɛbɛiti ta-masagiti ti ʋela, ti ʋela,
Wa yɛsu nɔ laani togani ɠotai wu,68:14 togani ɠotai wu: Tati pelei taɠili ɓalaa ka ga nii: kɔɔlaaɠai zu wo ɗa looɠo?
Siɛgi zu GALA Zɛbɛi-Pɛ-Maliɠii masagiti suvazani da,
Ɓasan ɠizei, ɠa ga maaɲɛɛba ɠizei.
leeni vaa zu, gizei, ɗɛi ɗɔungiti mɔinɗai, è toloi ɠulazu ga gizei,
GALA ná-kɔɔɠɔ wotoloiti ta ga waa mɔinmɔingiti, nu la zooga é ʋa ti ɠaalu,
È lɛɛni naa maazuʋɛ,
Mamagi ɠa Maliɠii ʋɛ,
Naama ƓALAGI ɠa é gi ʋɛ ga kizo GALAGI,
GALA ka sili nuiti tɔungi wolowolo,
Maliɠii ɠɛni ma: «Nà ʋaazu ga tiye, gè zeɠe ga tiye Ɓasan,
naa ɠa a kɛ, è è-ɠɔɠɔi maagba ɲamai zu,
Nuiti ta ɗa-ʋɛbɛi ziɛzuʋɛ ɠaazu, ee, GALA,
Guye loo nuiti ta loni ti untuɠɔ, naa ʋolu, niiti ti gɛingɛin ganigiti gɛinsu,
Ti ɗa ɠɛ ma: «À GALA mama wa-ɠaalɛbaiti su,
Wɛlɛ Ɓɛnzamɛn ʋa, nii dɔiɗai ti zaama, é loni ti untuɠɔ,
Ɗa-ƓALAGI devea ga é zobogi ve è ʋɛ.
È zei ʋɛlɛi nii é zɛlɛni Zeluzalɛme maazu,
Zelii lo seeligi zu zuai ma,
Nu wolaiti ta ʋaazu, ti zeɠe Ezipete yooi zu,
Etea masadai zu nuɓusɛiti kpein, à guyei loo GALA bɛ,
À guyei loo naa ʋɛ, nii é zeini geeɠɔlɔgi ɠɔma eɠɛ sooi, é ɗa ziɛ geeɠɔlɔ pɔlɔmai maazuʋɛ!
À GALA ná-zobodai zuɠwɛɛ!
Ee, GALA, è maayikiʋɛ è-zeizu ɲadegai.
